<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6053fd4b87a5d990952f87f5cebb3518</macroponent><name>badge_1_value</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var alertCount = api.data.alerts_count.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query[0].count;
    
    if (alertCount >= 1) {
        return alertCount;
    } else {
        return "0";
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hasnaat.khan.ems</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-13 08:37:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>48c74b9387b9d110952f87f5cebb35f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>badge_1_value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Electronic Monitoring" source="x_ster2_emfs">55b3012a1b8595106eb0a6c0604bcb35</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Electronic Monitoring">55b3012a1b8595106eb0a6c0604bcb35</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_48c74b9387b9d110952f87f5cebb35f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hasnaat.khan.ems</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-13 08:37:08</sys_updated_on><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
